title: Now It’s SIX Trillion Dollars! | Guest: Rep. Thomas Massie | 3/25/20
description:
Today, it’s YOUR show! Glenn hears from listeners across the nation about how they’re holding up during these hard times. The $2 trillion stimulus bill is now a $6 trillion bailout! Rep. Thomas Massie gives the inside scoop: It could pass without a vote to make way for more bills! And which is worse: President Trump opening the country back up as soon as possible or the death of the American idea? Head researcher Jason Buttrill previews tonight’s Wednesday show: “Big Government Virus: Never Let a Crisis Go to Waste.” And today’s COVID-19 update includes the queen, UV light, and Putin in a hazmat suit. Blaze host of the Conservative Review podcast Daniel Horowitz breaks down the ridiculous spending bill and what Americans really need.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
